EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Starting Now: EMS Changes, Challenges and Opportunities under Healthcare Reform - Jay Fitch Presenting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
TriTech Complimentary Webinar STARTING NOW EMS Changes, Challenges and Opportunities under Healthcare Reform
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}},
The complimentary live webinar "EMS Changes, Challenges and Opportunities under Healthcare Reform" with Jay Fitch presenting is starting, please login in now so you don't miss a thing.
LOGIN DETAILS JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/yzcxpkv AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial in over the telephone to the toll number shown on your screen after login
Questions? Login Issues: iLinc Support: 800-799-4510 Other Questions: Cheri Lane, TriTech Marketing Communications Manager: cheri.lane@tritech.com
Trouble logging in? Call 800.799.4510 to reach the iLinc support team for help
TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road, San Diego, CA 92121 info@tritech.com
